text: The Szczecin Lagoon (Polish name) or Stettin Lagoon (German name) or Lagoon of the Oder River is an inland water basin found in the southwestern part of the Baltic Sea. It is shared by Germany and Poland. These are the towns that can be found at the Szczecin Lagoon: Świnoujście, Ueckermünde, Wolin (town) and Nowe Warpno. == Towns, ports and beaches of Szczecin Lagoon == === Poland === * Towns: ** Nowe Warpno ** Świnoujście ** Wolin ** Trzebież ** Brzózki ** Kopice ** Czarnocin ** Skoszewo ** Płocin ** Sułomino ** Popielewo * Ports: ** Trzebież ** Stepnica ** Nowe Warpno ** Wolin * Beaches: ** Trzebież ** Popielewo ** Nowe Warpno ** Stepnica === Germany === * Towns: ** Ueckermünde ** Usedom ** Altwarp ** Vogelsang-Warsin ** Garz (Uznam) ** Kamminke ==Other websites== Category:Geography of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern Category:Bodies of water of Germany Category:Bodies of water of Poland Category:Lagoons
title: Szczecin Lagoon
